featured.text: Next time, being thin will finally fulfill its promise of everlasting happiness, self-worth, and, of course, love.
More importantly, if it's happiness that we want, why not put our energy there rather than on the size of our body?

definition.zh_def: 幸福，快樂的狀態或感覺。
definition.en_def: A state of well-being and contentment.
definition.example: Her smile was a clear sign of her happiness.
